solution_line_template: Martin invited {hometown_invited} * {school_multiplier} = <<{hometown_invited}*{school_multiplier}={school_invited}>>{school_invited} people from his school.
People from the sports club got {hometown_invited} + {school_invited} = <<{hometown_invited}+{school_invited}={sports_club_invited}>>{sports_club_invited} invitations.

So in total from the sports club, hometown and school, Martin invited {hometown_invited} + {school_invited} + {sports_club_invited} = <<{hometown_invited}+{school_invited}+{sports_club_invited}={total_main_invited}>>{total_main_invited} people.
That means Martin invited to his party {total_main_invited} + {other_invited} = <<{total_main_invited}+{other_invited}={total_invited}>>{total_invited} people.
